channel.title: Download Speed
channel.description:
I'll let the script do all the talking:
[code] { What do i do? I download 3 images varying in size, testing the time it takes to download each. I then calculate your download speed based on each images download time and create an average. } [/code]
My Example: [code] Testing #1(300kb) Time Taken: 2 seconds. Download Speed: 150kb/s.
Testing #2(600kb) Time Taken: 2 seconds. Download Speed: 300kb/s.
Testing #3(1000kb) Time Taken: 3 seconds. Download Speed: 333kb/s.
Average Download Speed: 261kb/s. Successfully executed [/code]

item.title: Download Speed
item.dc:creator: @Kane.temp Kane.temp
item.description:
@Kane.temp wrote:

Freddy1990:

I could host those images if you like…

Thanks for the offer, but it’s not really a problem.
Plus, can’t sign into XxKanexX and couldn’t be bothered PM’ing staff and waiting.

Wait… you’re staff. raises eyebrow

Read full topic

item.title: Download Speed
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Nashi:

Yea but freehostia’s bandwidth sucks so it’s not accurate =[

Yeah, i thought about that.
But i uploaded it to tinypic and it scaled the image down to 30KB, i guess it really does make it smaller.
And then Imageshack wouldn’t load…

I’m supposed to be downloading at 1-3MB+/s.

Read full topic

item.title: Download Speed
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

Testing #1(300kb) Time Taken: 1 seconds. Download Speed: 300kb/s.

Testing #2(600kb)
Time Taken: 2 seconds.
Download Speed: 300kb/s.

Testing #3(1000kb)
Time Taken: 3 seconds.
Download Speed: 333kb/s.

Average Download Speed: 311kb/s.
Successfully executed

SCAR apparently works fine with wine.

Read full topic

item.title: Download Speed
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

I’ll let the script do all the talking:

{ What do i do?
  I download 3 images varying in size, testing the time it takes
  to download each. I then calculate your download speed based
  on each images download time and create an average.
}

My Example:

Testing #1(300kb)
Time Taken: 2 seconds.
Download Speed: 150kb/s.
 
Testing #2(600kb)
Time Taken: 2 seconds.
Download Speed: 300kb/s.
 
Testing #3(1000kb)
Time Taken: 3 seconds.
Download Speed: 333kb/s.
 
Average Download Speed: 261kb/s.
